title: 456-Futureproof Skills for 2030-sudev
summary: The video emphasizes the importance of cultivating skills that foster human agency, interpersonal coordination, effective learning, AI proficiency, systems thinking, and authenticity in audience-building. As AI continues to advance, these skills are positioned to retain their economic value.
latentAbility: Provides a personalized weekly skill development prompt based on current trends.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT listed as a key futureproof skill?
options: Job specialization in a single, stable field
questions.correct: Job specialization in a single, stable field

options: They will retain economic value as AI advances
They are only useful for tech jobs
questions.correct: They will retain economic value as AI advances
